SHORT_DESCR.P: Cumbria County Council has invited consultants to tender for the Professional Services Framework (3).
The proposed structure is as follows:
— Lot 4a: Infrastructure, Planning, and Economic Appraisal (< 100 000 GBP),
— Lot 4b: Infrastructure, Planning, and Economic Appraisal (> 100 000 GBP).
To provide consultancy services which may be required to deliver a range of projects. Typically (but not exclusively) consultancy services will be required to deliver the following range of projects:
— upgrading and refurbishment of existing portfolio of properties.

The intention of the lot is to enable the single engagement of an Architect led team to deliver projects through all or any stages of the whole RIBA Plan of Work 2013, including all necessary sub-consultants. The range of services listed is intended to give scope to achieve this.
Typically (but not exclusively) consultancy services will be required to deliver the following range of projects:
• General civil engineering and infrastructure projects (including new works,
• improvement, refurbishment and maintenance related to Roads, Bridge,
• Upgrading and refurbishment of existing portfolio of properties.
• Early Contractor involvement on civil engineering and remediation projects.
Provide consultancy services which may be required to deliver a range of projects. Typically (but not.
